methods.name: public synchronized void setCallback(@Nullable Callback cb, @Nullable Handler handler)
methods.comment: Sets an instance of {@link LowpanScanner.Callback} to receive events.

methods.name: public void setCallback(@Nullable Callback cb)
methods.comment: Sets an instance of {@link LowpanScanner.Callback} to receive events.

methods.name: public void setChannelMask(@Nullable Collection<Integer> mask)
methods.comment: * Sets the channel mask to use when scanning. * * @param mask The channel mask to use when scanning. If null, any previously set * channel mask will be cleared and all channels not masked by the current regulatory zone * will be scanned.

methods.name: public Collection<Integer> getChannelMask()
methods.comment: * Gets the current channel mask. * * @return the current channel mask, or null if no channel mask is currently set.

methods.name: public void addChannel(int channel)
methods.comment:
* Adds a channel to the channel mask used for scanning. * *

If a channel mask was previously null, a new one is created containing only * this channel. May be called multiple times to add additional channels ot the channel mask. * * @see #setChannelMask * @see #getChannelMask * @see #getTxPower

methods.name: public void setTxPower(int txPower)
methods.comment:
* Sets the maximum transmit power to be used for active scanning. * *

The actual transmit power used is the lesser of this value and the currently configured * maximum transmit power for the interface. * * @see #getTxPower

methods.name: public int getTxPower()
methods.comment:
* Gets the maximum transmit power used for active scanning.
     *
     * @see #setTxPower

methods.name: public void startNetScan() throws LowpanException
methods.comment:
* Start a network scan. * *

This method will return once the scan has started. * * @see #stopNetScan

methods.name: public void stopNetScan()
methods.comment:
* Stop a network scan currently in progress.
     *
     * @see #startNetScan

methods.name: public void startEnergyScan() throws LowpanException
methods.comment:
* Start an energy scan. * *

This method will return once the scan has started. * * @see #stopEnergyScan

methods.name: public void stopEnergyScan()
methods.comment:
* Stop an energy scan currently in progress.
     *
     * @see #startEnergyScan

methodNames: public synchronized void setCallback(@Nullable Callback cb, @Nullable Handler handler)
